item.title: A couple of scripts for Emulator in the CI system
item.author: mail@joernahrens.de (Jörn Ahrens)
item.description:
Follow this path: Our Journey from Genymotion to the Android Emulator

This contains a couple of useful scripts to automate AVD management and such.

item.title: Android Screenshot Script
item.author: mail@joernahrens.de (Jörn Ahrens)
item.description:
Currently I’m trying a lot of automated UI testing on emulators.

This could be really helpful in the near future:

adb-screenshot.sh
